business.headline: Inflation hits 8-year low. Does your wallet agree?Inflation has fallen to an eight-year low, but are households really feeling the pinch ease in everyday expenses?
ChrysCapital takes over Theobroma bakery chain for Rs 2000 croresChrysCapital acquires majority control of Theobroma in a Rs 2,000 crore deal, with the founders retaining only a 10% minority stake.

Nithin Kamath explains how Sebi's quiet tech reform is empowering investorsBrokerage firms have to connect with several entities, like multiple stock exchanges, depositories, banks, and others. This meant hundreds of APIs and file formats had to be handled separately, creating hidden challenges behind the scenes.
SIPs, small-caps, and the Gen Z rush for high returnsGen Z investors are chasing big gains in mid- and small-cap funds, but soaring valuations and volatile markets mean the ride could get bumpy.

Tax perks, hidden costs, rental yield: What first-time homebuyers should knowStepping into the property market for the first time? Before you sign any papers, make sure you're financially prepared to handle not just the purchase price but the many hidden costs that follow. Here's a beginner's financial checklist to make your property investment a smart one.

NSDL rally hits roadblock after Q1 results, shares tumble nearly 5%. What next?After a strong IPO and initial rally, investors are reassessing NSDL's near-term growth prospects in light of mixed operational performance.
Explained: Why Paytm shares surged over 5% todayPaytm's share price rallied nearly 6% after RBI approval, lifting investor optimism amid steady business performance.

Markets open higher on easing inflation; mixed global cues keep investors cautiousThe S&P BSE Sensex initially rose over 300 points but pared some gains to trade 155.05 points higher at 80,390.64 around 9:25 am. The NSE Nifty50 was up 71.60 points to 24,559.

Sunjay Kapur's Rs 30,000-crore fortune without a will: Who's likely to gain most?In the weeks since Sunjay Kapur's death, the silence around succession has been broken by a chorus of competing voices: his mother Rani Kapur, his widow Priya Sachdev Kapur, his sisters, and even mentions of his former wives.
Nikkei's share average hits record-high, tops 43,000 for first timeThe Nikkei .N225 on Wednesday rose as much as 1.2 per cent in the first few minutes of trade to reach a record 43,241.27.

Lapses, irregularities, round tipping: Yes Bank's Rs 500 crore loan sale under scannerThe audit found indications that YES Bank may have indirectly financed the purchase of its own stressed asset. The transaction dates back to March 31, 2017, when the bank sold HDIL's non-performing loan, valued at over Rs 523 crore including interest, to Suraksha ARC for Rs 518 crore.

Ambanis retain crown as India's most valuable family business in 2025Mukesh Ambani leads Reliance Industries Limited, which has roots in the energy sector but also has major operations in retail and digital services. Founded in 1957 by Dhirubhai Ambani, the company is now managed by the second generation and continues to be a key force in India's economy.

Sebi rejects Anil Ambani's plea in Yes Bank case, ED probe continues: ReportThe case relates to investments worth Rs 21,500 crore made by Reliance Mutual Fund, then owned by Anil Ambani, in Yes Bank's additional tier-1 (AT-1) bonds between 2016 and 2019.

Retail inflation eases to 8-year low of 1.55% in JulyRetail inflation declined to an 8-year low in July 2025 as food prices plunged sharply. Both rural and urban areas experienced deflation in food prices, with rural food inflation at -1.74% and urban at -1.90%.
Sensex ends 368 points lower, Nifty below 24,500; Maruti down 2%The S&P BSE Sensex lost 368.49 points to end at 80,235.59, while the NSE Nifty50 declined by 97.65 points to close at 24,487.40.
RBI's job gets tougher, thanks to 50% US tariffsRBI kept the repo rate steady at 5.5% and warned that US tariffs and global supply issues could quickly change the outlook.

SIPs for the win: How Trump tariffs shook D-Street but boosted mutual fundsMutual funds are seeing record inflows even as markets struggle. Are SIP investors spotting an opportunity the rest are missing, or is it just faith in long-term discipline?
India bans land imports of more Bangladesh jute productsEarlier on June 27, India prohibited imports of a number of jute products and woven fabrics from Bangladesh through all land routes.

5 SIP myths that hurt investors more than markets, explains stock market expertMany investors blame market volatility for poor returns, but often, it's the myths they believe about SIPs that do more harm. Here's what an expert reveals.

How to repay a Rs 1 crore home loan in under 10 years and save Rs 52 lakhThe joy of getting the keys to your home is unmatched, but the reality of a 20-year (or longer) home loan often brings with it a heavy financial commitment.

Trump tariffs could worsen India's affordable housing crisis. Here's howDonald Trump's steep tariffs on Indian exports risk inflating construction costs, squeezing developers, and pushing affordable housing further out of reach for millions already struggling in India's overheated property market

New and old income tax regimes explained as ITR filing deadline extendedFor FY 2024-25, the new tax regime is automatically applied to taxpayers. Salaried individuals can still choose the old regime while filing their return, but if you miss the due date and file a belated ITR, it can only be done under the new regime.

Field notes from building a billion-dollar luxury brandDiverse leadership isn't just good business, it's the future blueprint for luxury real estate success. Parisa Seif, Managing Partner at Kleindienst Group, writes

New Income Tax Bill 2025: Will changes in the revised bill impact taxpayers?The updated Bill, presented by Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman on August 11, incorporates most of the recommendations made by the Select Committee. It is set to replace the six-decade-old Income Tax Act, 1961.

Sensex, Nifty rebound after falling in early trade; inflation data in focusThe S&P BSE Sensex fell over 150 points at the opening bell but swiftly recovered by 9:23 am. The Sensex was trading 10 points higher at 80,614.05, while the NSE Nifty50 traded 12.80 points higher at 24,597.85.

JSW Cement IPO allotment today: Check status online, listing date and GMPInvestors who applied for JSW IPO can check their allotment status online through the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE) website or the portal of KFin Technologies Limited.
Is it smart to use personal loan to fund your next trip?Most of the rise in holiday loans is from non-metro India. In 2025, 71% of borrowers came from Tier-2 and Tier-3 cities, up from 68% in 2023.

New Income Tax Bill approved: What's new after withdrawal of earlier draftThe original Income Tax Bill, 2025, was introduced on February 13 to replace the six-decade-old Income Tax Act, 1961. However, last week, the government decided to pull it back, saying the changes suggested by the Select Committee needed to be included in a fresh draft.

ICICI Bank raises minimum balance to Rs 50,000: What RBI governor saidICICI Bank has raised the minimum balance from Rs 10,000 to Rs 50,000. In semi-urban branches, it has gone up from Rs 5,000 to Rs 25,000. In rural branches, the requirement is now Rs 10,000.

Air India to suspend Delhi-Washington direct flights from September 1Despite the halt of the direct Delhi-Washington service, Air India will continue offering one-stop flights to Washington via partner airlines Alaska Airlines, United Airlines, and Delta Air Lines.
Sensex ends 746 points up, Nifty above 24,500; Tata Motors gains 3%The S&P BSE Sensex added 746.29 points to close at 80,604.08, while the NSE Nifty50 gained 221.75 points to end at 24,585.05.

Equity mutual fund inflows soar to record high in July. Check detailsNet flows into equity schemes rose 81% month-on-month to Rs 42,702 crore in July, data from the Association of Mutual Funds in India (AMFI) showed. Overall, assets under management in the mutual fund industry hit a record high at Rs 75.36 lakh crore.

Sensex gains 700 points: Why is stock market rising today?The rally was led by public sector banking and auto sector stocks. Banking stocks were in focus after State Bank of India (SBI) posted strong Q1 results, which prompted positive commentary from brokerages.

From health insurance and tax: 7 money-related myths decodedFrom health insurance and tax filing to investing and retirement planning, understanding the truth behind common myths can help you make confident, well-informed decisions for your future.

ITR-5 excel utility opens: What is it and who must fileIf filing physically, taxpayers must verify the return by sending the signed ITR-V form to the Centralised Processing Centre (CPC) in Bengaluru within 30 days, unless they choose to e-verify instead.

Why 'Make in India' still depends so much on China-made goodsWhen Prime Minister Narendra Modi launched the 'Make in India' programme in 2014, it was meant to transform India into a global manufacturing hub, create millions of jobs, and reduce dependence on imports, especially from China.

From ban to profit sharing: Inside US deal with Nvidia, AMD on China chip salesThe deal makes the US a direct financial beneficiary of sensitive technology sales to a geopolitical rival. This article looks into the key details of this first-of-its-kind agreement.

ICICI Bank new minimum balance rules: FAQs, charges, and key informationIn metro and urban branches, the minimum average balance will jump from Rs 10,000 to Rs 50,000. For semi-urban areas, it will increase from Rs 5,000 to Rs 25,000.

Borrowed cash from a friend? You may end up paying income tax penaltyThe income tax department is strict when it comes to large cash transactions. Whether it's taking a loan, repaying one, or even making donations, there are limits you need to follow. Go beyond those, and you could face a penalty equal to the entire amount involved.

BlueStone Jewellery IPO opens for bidding: Should you subscribe?The IPO consists of a fresh issue of 1.59 crore shares worth Rs 820 crore and an offer for sale of 1.39 crore shares worth Rs 720.65 crore.

entertainment.headline: Sushmita Sen recalls meeting Trump, says he wasn't very memorableActor Sushmita Sen opens up about overseeing Miss India Universe during Donald Trump's tenure as owner, sharing her honest thoughts on both the role and Trump.

Leonardo DiCaprio searched by cops at Ibiza party, Travis Scott denied entryOscar-winning actor Leonardo DiCaprio was briefly stopped and searched by cops at an exclusive tequila party in Ibiza. The incident highlights strict security measures at celebrity events despite star status.

Rajinikanth's fans perform rituals at Madurai temple praying for Coolie's successSuperstar Rajinikanth's 'Coolie', directed by Lokesh Kanagaraj, will hit theatres on August 14. His fans performed several rituals at a temple in Madurai praying for the film's success.

Mrunal Thakur's new post amid Bipasha Basu body-shaming row: Stop staringActor Mrunal Thakur shared an Instagram post amid criticism of her comments on fellow actor Bipasha Basu. In the photos, Thakur was seen posing in an all-black outfit and matching sunglasses.

Akshay Kumar calls Twinkle's Tamma Tamma dance questionable in witty commentAkshay Kumar teased his wife, Twinkle Khanna, after she attempted to recreate Madhuri Dixit and Sanjay Dutt's 'Tamma Tamma' song went wrong.

Why Karnataka is enraged over demolition of Kannada icon Vishnuvardhan's memorialThe demolition of Kannada matinee icon Dr Vishnuvardhan's memorial in Bengaluru has sparked outrage among fans who condemned the act. Several actors, including Kichcha Sudeep and Rishab Shetty voiced their opinions on the matter, criticising the act.

With Love Meghan season 2 trailer: Meghan Markle's show to feature Jay Shetty'With Love, Meghan' is set to return on Netflix on August 26 with its second season. The trailer for the upcoming show was released on Tuesday. The second season will feature guests like television personalities Tan France, Chrissy Teigen and podcaster Jay Shetty.

Olivia Rodrigo's diamond ring fuels buzz about engagement to Louis PartridgePopstar Olivia Rodrigo was seen in Los Angeles with boyfriend Louis Partridge, wearing a diamond ring on her engagement finger, prompting speculation about a possible engagement.

Choreographer Bosco Martis on Alpha: You'll see a new Alia and SharvariBosco Martis is excited about his choreography for Yash Raj Films' action film 'Alpha'. The movie promises fresh performances and a stylish spy thriller experience.

Coolie first review: Udhayanidhi Stalin calls Rajinikanth film ultimate entertainerUdhayanidhi Stalin, Deputy Chief Minister of Tamil Nadu and former actor and producer, watched Rajinikanth's 'Coolie' ahead of its grand release. He called it an ultimate mass entertainer that will impress people of all ages.
KBC 17: Amitabh Bachchan recalls treating parents to dinner with first salaryThe premiere show of KBC 17 saw Amitabh Bachchan recalling the first time he took his parents out to a restaurant.

Reinvention of Jr NTR: How the star is redefining his image for pan-India audienceJr NTR is set to make a significant impact in Bollywood with 'War 2', starring opposite Hrithik Roshan. This film is expected to elevate his status from a Telugu superstar to a pan-Indian icon, blending action and emotional depth.

War 2: Jr NTR thanks Naidu, Pawan Kalyan for price hike, extra shows in AndhraAhead of 'War 2' release, Jr NTR, in a post, expressed his gratitude to Andhra Pradesh Chief Minister N Chandrababu Naidu and Deputy CM Pawan Kalyan for their support.

You made my life colourful: Parag Tyagi's note for Shefali on wedding anniversaryOn Tuesday, actor Parag Tyagi marked his 11th wedding anniversary with Shefali Jariwala by sharing a heartfelt note on Instagram. The couple's journey began in 2010 when they first met.

Boney Kapoor's sweet gesture for Sridevi's 27th birthday backfired. See picBoney Kapoor shared a special post on his wife Sridevi's 62nd birth anniversary. He recalled an anecdote about his sweet gesture for his late wife on her 27th birthday.

Balancing Rajinikanth's stardom and story: Coolie director Lokesh Kanagaraj's big test'Coolie' isn't just a gift for Rajinikanth's 50th-year celebration, it's director Lokesh Kanagaraj's boldest gamble yet, balancing superstar swagger, ensemble weight, and a possible sci-fi twist in a saturated gangster genre.

Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce's love story: From friendship band to epic romanceTravis Kelce shared insights on his natural romance with Taylor Swift amid media attention. He recalled how he gifted her a friendship bracelet with his number on it.

Court Kacheri review: Strong performances are the USP of this legal dramedyRelease Date:Wed Aug 13, 2025Court Kacheri series review: 'Court Kacheri' is a coming-of-age legal drama focusing on a fractured father-son relationship. The series is currently streaming on SonyLiv.

War 2 release, ticket prices, end credits, advance booking - all you need to knowWar 2 featuring actors Hrithik Roshan and Jr NTR releases on August 14, coinciding with actor Rajinikanth's Coolie. Here's a look at the ticket prices, advance booking report, box office prediction, end credits and more.

general news.headline: Sonia Gandhi's name added to voter roll before she was citizen: BJP's big chargeSonia Gandhi's name added to voter roll before she was citizen: BJP's big charge

Will look into it: Chief Justice amid fury over Supreme Court's stray dog orderRecently, the Supreme Court directed civic bodies to round up all stray dogs in Delhi-NCR within eight weeks and send them to shelters. The order triggered a backlash from animal activists and NGOs.

Will Congress apologise, BJP smirks as Bihar's Minta Devi hits out at GandhisUnion Minister Kiren Rijiju on Wednesday criticised the Congress party and Opposition MPs for allegedly mocking a Bihar woman, Minta Devi, during their protest against the Special Intensive Revision (SIR) of voter rolls in Bihar.

Suresh Raina quizzed in illegal betting app case. 10 questions ED asked himFormer Indian cricketer Suresh Raina, who hung his boots in 2022, was summoned by the ED in connection with his links to illegal online betting platform 1XBet.

Dear Dump Truck, My Mercedes is Already Stalling Due to EthanolThe real threat to the Mercedes called India isn't Asim Munir's rickety dump truck. It's our own engine being corroded by ethanol of all kinds. The engine needs servicing and pure petrol so that others don't zoom past us.

Rajiv Rudy triumphs in Delhi club battle that saw Amit Shah, Sonia Gandhi voteBJP leader Rajiv Pratap Rudy has maintained his 25-year-old dominance in the Constitution Club management, seeing off a challenge from his party colleague Sanjeev Balyan.

Video: Tamil Nadu student, wife of DMK leader, skips Governor RN Ravi at convocationA student avoided Tamil Nadu Governor RN Ravi during convocation and received her degree from the Vice Chancellor instead. She is the wife of a DMK leader and did so to reportedly highlight the standoff between the Governor and the government.

Why BEST society polls will be first ground test of Uddhav-Raj Thackeray pactThe Shiv Sena (UBT) and Maharashtra Navnirman Sena joining forces could galvanise their core Marathi voters in and around Mumbai and pay off in the BMC polls due this year

Why Karnataka is enraged over demolition of Kannada icon Vishnuvardhan's memorialThe demolition of Kannada matinee icon Dr Vishnuvardhan's memorial in Bengaluru has sparked outrage among fans who condemned the act. Several actors, including Kichcha Sudeep and Rishab Shetty voiced their opinions on the matter, criticising the act.

PM Modi likely to meet Trump next month in US as trade tensions simmerDuring PM Modi's likely visit to New York, plans are afoot to schedule a meeting with US President Donald Trump to iron out issues on trade amid a downturn in ties.

Rohit Sharma rises to No. 2 in ICC ODI rankings amid retirement rumoursIndia captain Rohit Sharma has risen to second place in the ICC ODI batting rankings. His rise follows a dip in form for Pakistan's Babar Azam, who struggled in a three-match ODI series against the West Indies in August.

Tackling stray dogs is as simple as ABC. Court's impractical order misses itThe Supreme Court's August 11 order - to remove stray dogs from the streets, sterilise them and move them to shelters permanently - is neither practical nor humane.

Salim Pistol, India's most wanted arms supplier arrested in Nepal, brought to DelhiOn the run since 2018, Salim Pistol was arrested at the India-Nepal border on August 9. He is the first person to have supplied Zigana pistols to gangsters in India.

KBC hosts officers Sofiya Qureshi, Vyomika Singh after Op Sindoor, stirs rowColonel Sofiya Qureshi and Wing Commander Vyomika Singh, who were the face of Operation Sindoor and led the media briefings, will appear on a special episode of KBC. A promo of the episode has sparked a controversy. Here is why.

UP horror: Deaf-mute woman chased by bikers, gang-raped; 2 arrested after encounterA 21-year-old specially-abled woman was allegedly gang-raped in Uttar Pradesh's Balrampur, police said. The survivor was caught on camera running for her life on a deserted road, with bike-borne men chasing her.

Why the weight you lose quickly returns (and how to stop it)From the high of proudly losing 10 kg in a month to the disappointment of gaining it all back, the quick-loss–quick-gain cycle takes a toll on your body and mind. But with the right approach, you can shed it in a way that's sustainable and lasting.

What next for Bengali migrants heeding Mamata call to return from BJP-ruled states?Bengali identity politics aside, the returnees pose both a humanitarian and socioeconomic integration challenge for the Trinamool Congress government

Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce's love story: From friendship band to epic romanceTravis Kelce shared insights on his natural romance with Taylor Swift amid media attention. He recalled how he gifted her a friendship bracelet with his number on it.

A question Congress needs to answer on sacked Karnataka ministerThe Congress is seeking answers from the Election Commission over electoral rolls. However, it has fired a Karnataka minister for asking pertinent questions on the same issue. What were the troubling questions that made the Congress remove a minister? Will Congress answer the one big question?

Before you sign any papers, make sure you're financially prepared to handle not just the purchase price but the many hidden costs that follow. Here's a beginner's financial checklist to make your property investment a smart one.

Pak attack on Army post in J&K's Baramulla foiled, soldier killedThe Indian Army launched a large-scale cordon and search operation in the Uri sector of Baramulla district, foiling a major infiltration attempt.

Bengaluru woman alleges 10 cab drivers chased her, attacked family after road rageA woman in Bengaluru alleged that 10–12 cab drivers chased her after a reckless overtake and vandalised her car. The group reportedly assaulted her father and relatives. Hulimavu Police have registered an FIR and begun investigations.

One organ donor can save 8 lives, yet 5 lakh people await transplants yearlyOrgan donation after brain death offers hope to patients needing vital organs. Despite high registrations, India's actual transplant numbers remain low, highlighting awareness challenges.

sports.headline: Rohit Sharma rises to No. 2 in ICC ODI rankings amid retirement rumoursIndia captain Rohit Sharma has risen to second place in the ICC ODI batting rankings. His rise follows a dip in form for Pakistan's Babar Azam, who struggled in a three-match ODI series against the West Indies in August.

Nation above cricket: Harbhajan slams BCCI over India-Pakistan Asia Cup clashFormer Indian cricketer Harbhajan Singh feels that India should boycott playing against Pakistan in Asia Cup 2025. He believes that playing a cricket match is of very little importance when compared to the sacrifices of soldiers.

Liam Livingstone destroys Rashid Khan, spinner registers worst figures in HundredRashid Khan registered the worst-ever figures in the Hundred as he was taken to the cleaners in Match 11 vs Birmingham Phoenix. He was smacked for 26 runs in the final five balls by Liam Livingstone.

India to submit bid to host 2030 Commonwealth GamesThe Indian Olympic Association has approved India's 2030 Commonwealth Games bid, in a SGM meeting on August 13. The final date to submit documents is August 31.

SC cancels Sushil Kumar's bail in murder case, ordered to surrender within a weekThe Supreme Court of India has cancelled Sushil Kumar's bail in the Sagar Dhankar murder case and has ordered him to surrender within a week. Sushil was granted bail by the Delhi High Court in March earlier this year.

Jayden Seales breaks Steyn's 12-year-old record with menacing spell vs PakistanWest Indies fast bowler Jayden Seales etched his name in the history books as he broke Dale Steyn's 12-year-old record with a breathtaking spell vs Pakistan.

Premier League: Can Manchester United turn their revamp to redemption?Manchester United begin a new era under Ruben Amorim after their worst league finish in history. A revamped attack, steadier defence, and lingering midfield doubts set the stage for a high-stakes opener against Arsenal on August 17.

West Indies needs to stand up to ICC: Clive LlyodFormer cricketer Clive Lloyd has warned West Indies that they may remain in the World Test Championship's lower tier if a two-tier system starts. Llyod has called for an urgent revamp of the financial structure.

Behind the speed: The making of Animesh Kujur, India's fastest manIndia Today spent a full morning with Animesh Kujur in Bhubaneshwar. Animesh, spoke to the publication about his childhood, upbringing and the relentless pursuit to become better every day. As he builds for the World Championships, here's a detailed look at how he became the fastest man in India.

Fresh off World Cup success, Divya Deshmukh continues giant-slaying runFresh from her historic Women's World Cup triumph, 19-year-old Divya Deshmukh underlined her status as India's brightest chess prospect with a commanding 10–3 demolition of China's world No. 7 Lei Tingjie at the 2025 Women's Speed Chess Championship, adding another top-ranked scalp to her growing list.

Hope 120, Pakistan 92-all out: Fans fume over 1st ODI series loss in 34 yearsPakistan fans lost their cool at the cricket team after Mohammed Rizwan's side were bowled out for just 92 runs in the series-decider against West Indies. This is the first time that Pakistan have lost an ODI bilateral to West Indies since 1991/92.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
